application.doc: Retrieving the list of address identifiers for an interface

param.name: interface_id
param.doc: ID of the application interface. Valid values are P.1, P.2, P.3, and P.4.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving the list of address identifiers for an interface
method.doc: To retrieve the list of address identifiers for an interface with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the application interfaces resource URI.
